system.description: The psyker can sacrifice their physical form to enhance their psychic powers, converting bodily health into raw warp energy.
system.benefit: Can choose to perform Corpus Conversion prior to manifesting a Psychic Power. The Psyker chooses to gain up to Toughness Bonus additional Degrees of Success on a Focus Power Test should they succeed on it, however they suffer 1d10 non-permanent Toughness Damage per Degree of Success gained this way, and one Corruption Point. Note this doesn't guarantee the character passes the test; if they don't they don't gain anything but still take the damage.

prerequisites.text: Tier 2: Psy Rating, Human (non Space Marine)

specialAbilities.name: Sacrifice Flesh for Power
specialAbilities.description: Prior to manifesting a Psychic Power, choose to gain up to Toughness Bonus additional Degrees of Success on successful Focus Power Test. Suffer 1d10 non-permanent Toughness Damage per DoS gained and 1 Corruption Point.
